title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Updated
description: This task involves gathering and documenting the detailed requirements for the VMGuard project. The document should cover specific types of virtual machines (e.g., VMware, Hyper-V, AWS EC2, Azure VMs), cloud environments (public, private, hybrid), backup strategies (full, incremental, differential), backup scheduling options, data retention policies, restore capabilities, security considerations (encryption methods such as AES-256, access controls like RBAC), user interface needs (web-based, mobile app UX/UI design specifics with responsive design for various screen sizes and platforms), integration with existing infrastructure and other tools (API documentation should be included), disaster recovery plans, notification systems, monitoring capabilities, detailed error handling mechanisms. Additionally, consider additional features such as version control, scalability, and compatibility. Break down this task into smaller sub-tasks for efficient progress. The document will serve as the basis for further project development. Once complete, it will be reviewed by the code-architect, project-manager, security-specialist, technical-writer, and qa-tester. It is recommended to include a section on performance metrics and SLAs.

title: Design System Architecture for VMGuard
description: Design the overall architecture of the VMGuard system, including components, data flows, integration points with cloud providers and virtual machine management systems. The design should prioritize scalability, fault tolerance, security, performance, disaster recovery, and consider potential future growth and expansion of the system. Key considerations include modularity for easy maintenance and upgrade, compatibility with various hybrid cloud environments, and seamless interaction with third-party backup solutions. Additionally, provide a roadmap for implementing and deploying the proposed architecture.

title: Develop Backup and Recovery Mechanisms
description: Implement the core functionality for backing up and restoring virtual machines, including scheduling, compression, deduplication, and encryption.

title: Implement Cloud Integration
description: Develop the necessary components and APIs to integrate with various cloud providers and virtual machine management systems.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Create a user-friendly interface for configuring and managing backups, monitoring backup status, and initiating restores.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the security of the VMGuard system by implementing access controls, data encryption, and other security best practices.

title: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Establish a testing framework and continuous integration pipeline for automated testing and deployment of the VMGuard system.

title: Develop Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the VMGuard system, including installation, configuration, and usage instructions.

title: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform thorough testing of the VMGuard system, including functional, integration, performance, and security testing, to ensure it meets the defined requirements and quality standards.

title: Deploy and Monitor VMGuard System
description: Deploy the VMGuard system in production environments, monitor its performance and usage, and provide ongoing maintenance and support.
dependencies: Conduct System Testing and Quality Assurance
